column5: Welcome to Austin! This house is located in a friendly, quiet neighborhood with many shops and restaurants within minutes and just 10 min from Zilker Park / Town Lake and 15 minutes from downtown. The house itself comfortably sleeps 6 and has a pull out sofa that could sleep an additional 2. There's full kitchen, private backyard, off the street parking, and washer / dryer in the house. It is great for families, groups, or anyone wanting a local Austin experience!
